abstract: An exhibition on hotels particuliers, extravagant stone mansions that were the urban alternative to the countryside chateaux, gives a view into the life of the Parisian upper crust.
snippet: An exhibition on hotels particuliers, extravagant stone mansions that were the urban alternative to the countryside chateaux, gives a view into the life of the Parisian upper crust.

headline.main: Paris Exhibit Shows How the Other Half Lived
